comment:
* Interface for receiving events related to Broadcast Source
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: void onBroadcastStarted(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
methods.comment:
* Callback invoked when broadcast is started, but audio may not be playing. * *

Caller should wait for {@link #onBroadcastMetadataChanged(int, * BluetoothLeBroadcastMetadata)} for the updated metadata * * @param reason for broadcast start * @param broadcastId as defined by the Basic Audio Profile * @hide

methods.name: void onBroadcastStartFailed(@Reason int reason)
methods.comment:
* Callback invoked when broadcast failed to start
         *
         * @param reason for broadcast start failure
         * @hide

methods.name: void onBroadcastStopped(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
methods.comment:
* Callback invoked when broadcast is stopped
         *
         * @param reason for broadcast stop
         * @hide

methods.name: void onBroadcastStopFailed(@Reason int reason)
methods.comment:
* Callback invoked when broadcast failed to stop
         *
         * @param reason for broadcast stop failure
         * @hide

methods.name: void onPlaybackStarted(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
methods.comment:
* Callback invoked when broadcast audio is playing
         *
         * @param reason for playback start
         * @param broadcastId as defined by the Basic Audio Profile
         * @hide

methods.name: void onPlaybackStopped(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
methods.comment:
* Callback invoked when broadcast audio is not playing
         *
         * @param reason for playback stop
         * @param broadcastId as defined by the Basic Audio Profile
         * @hide

methods.name: void onBroadcastUpdated(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
methods.comment:
* Callback invoked when encryption is enabled
         *
         * @param reason for encryption enable
         * @param broadcastId as defined by the Basic Audio Profile
         * @hide

methods.name: void onBroadcastUpdateFailed(int reason, int broadcastId)
methods.comment:
* Callback invoked when Broadcast Source failed to update
         *
         * @param reason for update failure
         * @param broadcastId as defined by the Basic Audio Profile
         * @hide

methods.name: void onBroadcastMetadataChanged(int broadcastId, @NonNull BluetoothLeBroadcastMetadata metadata)
methods.comment:
* Callback invoked when Broadcast Source metadata is updated
         *
         * @param metadata updated Broadcast Source metadata
         * @param broadcastId as defined by the Basic Audio Profile
         * @hide

methodNames: void onBroadcastStarted(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
void onBroadcastStopped(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
void onPlaybackStarted(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
void onPlaybackStopped(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
void onBroadcastUpdated(@Reason int reason, int broadcastId)
